column1: There are many lessons for a young man to learn on the football field. Thankfully the values Coach Mayfield instilled in me over the course of the 1965 season stuck with me for life.   Special thanks to ECISD for honoring me with a scoreboard shoutout jersey and helmet. https://t.co/XBMI1MlMWi

The Senate hearings made it clear to the American people how intelligent and qualified Amy Coney Barrett is for her seat on the Supreme Court. Congratulations to Justice Barrett on her confirmation! https://t.co/WaMzIfUYzb

In May I voted for a resolution condemning these egregious human rights violations by the People’s Republic of China. The Chinese Communist government must be held accountable for their crimes. https://t.co/QrYQb4mJo0

Ӧmir Bekali was horribly tortured for over seven months in a Chinese concentration camp after he was unjustly imprisoned because of his Uighur Muslim heritage. There are over a million more just like him who are still suffering and dying in these prisons. https://t.co/xMwixALaBj
@RepJeffMiller I wish it was Jeff! In fact my staff made the same comment and suggested we replace my Chairman's gavel with an ice cold DC.
how it started vs. how it’s going https://t.co/DmtNNeV34j

.@RulesDemocrats just blocked my amendment to restore the bipartisan deal on @USDA funding from even coming to the House Floor for a vote. Our farm and ranch families need our support but @HouseDemocrats are just thumbing their noses at America's heartland. https://t.co/8I9RpV7eiI

It shouldn't come as a surprise anymore but House Dems are once again preventing @USDA from providing much needed support to America's farmers and ranchers. @SpeakerPelosi this is not a game. Stop holding rural America hostage.
Read about the bipartisan resolution we introduced yesterday with 21 Texas House Members and @GOPLeader McCarthy here:  https://t.co/qCZml0OTOo

Proud to stand with @RepMcCaul and Paula Reed calling for the release of her son Trevor a former Marine and Texas native who has been sentenced to nine years in a Russian prison on false politically-motivated charges. Putin must immediately #FreeTrevorReed https://t.co/56gw6njfDG
Thank you for the kind words @SecretarySonny. It's been a pleasure to work with you on behalf of American agriculture! https://t.co/rA4LSVgqlw

Trevor Reed is a former US Marine & Texas native who was wrongfully detained in Russia and sentenced to 9 years in prison – all on baseless accusations & trumped up charges. The Putin regime must immediately #FreeTrevorReed. Learn more: https://t.co/qCZml0OTOo
This is excellent news for the future of electromagnetic railguns and laser technology in the military something I’ve advocated for years 👉 https://t.co/KUJAgPr2rK
Thanks to @EPAAWheeler for approving this new antiviral product. I’m glad the State of Texas now has yet another tool to protect the public. https://t.co/hd5RHQ4Kh6

Speaker Pelosi is propagandizing a baseless conspiracy theory about the USPS to manufacture a crisis before the 2020 election and damage President Trump.  USPS is fully capable of handling election mail and has enough money to last until 2021. Read more👇https://t.co/ZzvTHbpnUt
The UN's new sanctions reinforce my resolution that demands an end to NK's labor camp system. You can read more here: https://t.co/SdhP9swxSl
North Korea is committing egregious human rights violations by imprisoning and torturing innocent individuals. The US Congress must act to condemn these abuses. https://t.co/WNrGYBNCis
We cannot allow the current crisis to be used as an excuse to permanently expand SNAP spending especially when the program already provides aid to anyone who qualifies.  https://t.co/ONtUJiDwNg
Five Eyes and NATO allies are suspending their extradition treaty agreements with Hong Kong now that the CCP has usurped Hong Kong's autonomy. The U.S. should follow suit: https://t.co/JfpVT5FQCV
The CCP just issued arrest warrants for six pro-democracy activists in Hong Kong including an American citizen https://t.co/vbsMOUcUoX

(2/2) I cannot overstate the importance of keeping this pro-energy President in the White House to stand up for West Texas and our way of life—and I thank him for making the trip out to the Permian Basin.

It was an immense honor to show @POTUS around my hometown and have the opportunity to speak candidly with him about the significance of the Permian Basin and its critical contributions to national security and the economy.  📸Official White House Photos by Shealah Craighead https://t.co/zqXx0TGD5r
Looking forward to showing @POTUS the terrific energy operations we have in the Permian Basin today! https://t.co/Vf5PQjV9do
Tune in now to watch as I honor the life of my friend Col. Charles Powell on the House Floor 👇 https://t.co/RwU3BqXvyG
We can NOT allow taxpayer funded abortion to sneak into the next COVID package which is why I introduced the Protecting Life in Crisis Act.  https://t.co/qNj2G2PqDS
This is an important step to give women accurate factual information about chemical abortions. The fight to protect life is never over.

That’s why I’ve introduced the #SecondChanceatLifeAct that requires medical providers to disclose to women who had a chemical abortion— the remedy that reverses the abortion and the baby’s life could be saved.

1 in 5 women who take the abortion pill will experience complications requiring surgery. Removing restrictions endangers women’s health and safety leaving without medical care in case of an emergency. #SecondChanceatLifeAct
Glad to see the UK reversing course on this. Allowing the CCP access to US & allies telecommunications networks would be a costly mistake.  https://t.co/UMsgWBQ0B0
Democrats are refusing to work with Republicans to pass meaningful police reform legislation that will make a difference in our communities. Read my full statement 👇https://t.co/qvtyG1EH0s

Glad to be back in D.C. today voting to replenish the Paycheck Protection Program that is quite literally saving small businesses and keeping paychecks in the pockets of our workers. This is long overdue. https://t.co/3DMAOiaAUR

The heartbeat of accurate and critical hyper local COVID-19 updates for rural communities are small radio television and newspapers. Local media outlets are crucial to continue supporting public awareness. My colleagues and I are calling on the Executive Branch to take action👇🏼 https://t.co/QOXaOLUYoB
Check out this #TX11 spotlight on proactivity during this pandemic. Way to go!   https://t.co/06hDYyR5TN
De Leon High School in #TX11 has 3D printed face shields for their local hospital. Terrific! 👍🏻 ##AmericaWorksTogether https://t.co/9l7CYjPXo6
@AaronBurrell23 @realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr @tedcruz Thanks for sharing the good news! We'd love to hear your story: https://t.co/NTX91b3KOj
The Paycheck Protection Program has directly supported an estimated 30 MILLION jobs.  We must continue to fuel this resource!
The Paycheck Protection Program has sent nearly 28.5 billion dollars directly to small businesses in Texas - with over 134000 loans approved. PPP is saving the livelihoods of hardworking Americans.
There is no doubt we’re tough but the overwhelming acts of kindness donations and overall desire to serve one another is hard to ignore. You are the reason we will rise from this better together.

#COVID19 triggered countless challenges and obstacles for families across America. Whether they are physically affected by the virus or battling financial stress and personal chaos due to several unexpected changes. Amidst this uncertain time Americans are stronger than ever.
